content.query:
CREATE VIEW dbo.VW_Department 
AS
SELECT OMD.[OMOPERATINGUNITNUMBER] 'Department_ID'
	  ,replace(OMD.[NAME],' Dept','') 'Department'
	  ,case
			when OMD.OMOPERATINGUNITNUMBER like '2%' and OMD.OMOPERATINGUNITNUMBER <> '28' then 'Operations'
			when OMD.OMOPERATINGUNITNUMBER like '3%' or OMD.OMOPERATINGUNITNUMBER = '28' then 'Sales'
			when OMD.OMOPERATINGUNITNUMBER like '8%' then 'Support'
			else 'Unknown'
		end 'Primary_Function'
	  ,case
			when OMD.OMOPERATINGUNITNUMBER  = '24' then 'Sales'
			when OMD.OMOPERATINGUNITNUMBER  = '28' then 'Operations'
			when OMD.OMOPERATINGUNITNUMBER = '32' then 'Support'
			when OMD.OMOPERATINGUNITNUMBER like '2%' then 'Operations'
			when OMD.OMOPERATINGUNITNUMBER like '3%' then 'Sales'
			when OMD.OMOPERATINGUNITNUMBER like '8%' then 'Support'
			else 'Unknown'
	   end 'Secondary_Function'
	  ,isnull(DIR2.NAME,'No Leader') 'Department_Head'
FROM [Briggs_MST].[OMDepartmentView_ext] OMD
left join [Briggs_MST].[DIRPartyTable_ext] DIR on dir.PARTYNUMBER = OMD.PARTYNUMBER
left join [Briggs_MST].[HCMWorker_ext] HCM on HCM.recid = DIR.HCMWORKER
left join [Briggs_MST].[DIRPartyTable_ext] DIR2 on DIR2.recid = HCM.PERSON
GO

--

CREATE VIEW dbo.VW_Customer
AS
WITH cte_MinitracConversion
AS
(
SELECT DISTINCT cusnum
			   ,CASE 
					WHEN len(cusnum) = 4 THEN 'C100' + cast(cusnum as varchar)
					WHEN len(cusnum) = 5 THEN 'C10' + cast(cusnum as varchar)
				    WHEN len(cusnum) = 6 THEN 'C1' + cast(cusnum as varchar)
					ELSE null
				END 'Customer Account'
FROM [BIE_DATA_WAREHOUSE].[MPCust_ext]
)
SELECT CT.accountnum 'Customer_ID'
	  ,DIR.name 'Customer_Name'
	  ,CT.accountnum + ' - ' + DIR.name 'Customer'
	  ,CASE 
			WHEN CT.INVOICEACCOUNT = '' THEN 'Bill-to'
			WHEN CT.INVOICEACCOUNT <> '' THEN 'Ship-to'
			ELSE null 
	   END 'Customer_Account_Type'
	  ,isnull(cast([DATE_OPENED] as date),cast(CT.CREATEDDATETIME as date)) 'Date_Account_Opened'
	  ,CG.NAME 'Customer_Group'
	  ,rtrim(ltrim(
	   CASE
			WHEN CCG.DESCRIPTION like 'TAA%' THEN  ccg.DESCRIPTION
			ELSE isnull(substring(CCG.DESCRIPTION,charindex('-',CCG.DESCRIPTION)+1,len(CCG.DESCRIPTION)),'NO REP')
	   END)) 'Collections_Agent'
	  ,CASE 
			WHEN CT.blocked = 0 THEN 'None'
			WHEN CT.blocked = 3 THEN 'Payment'
			WHEN CT.blocked = 20 THEN 'Stopped'
			WHEN CT.blocked = 2 THEN 'All'  
			ELSE 'None'
	   END 'Account_Hold_Type'
	  ,CASE 
			WHEN CT.POREQUIRED = 1 THEN 'Yes' 
			ELSE 'No' 
	   END 'PO_Required'
	  ,isnull(BCT.DESCRIPTION,'Unknown') 'Collection_Type_Description'
FROM [Briggs_MST].[CustTable_ext] CT
left join [Briggs_MST].[DIRPartyTable_ext] DIR on DIR.recid = CT.party
left join [Briggs_MST].[CustGroup_ext] CG on CG.CUSTGROUP = CT.CUSTGROUP
left join [Briggs_MST].[XAP_CreditCustomerGroups_ext] CCG on CCG.recid = CT.CREDITCUSTOMERGROUPS
left join [Briggs_MST].[XAP_PartPriceGroup_ext] PPG on PPG.recid = CT.PARTPRICEGROUPRECID
left join [Briggs_MST].[PayMTerm_ext] PAYM on PAYM.PAYMTERMID = ct.PAYMTERMID
left join [Briggs_MST].[SMMBUSRelSalesDistrictGroup_ext] SDC on sdc.SALESDISTRICTID = ct.SALESDISTRICTID
left join cte_MinitracConversion CONV on CONV.[Customer Account] = CT.ACCOUNTNUM
left join [BIE_DATA_WAREHOUSE].[MPCust_ext] MT on MT.CUSNUM = conv.CUSNUM
left join [Briggs_MST].[BRGCollectionType_ext] BCT ON BCT.BRG_CUSTOMERCOLLECTIONTYPE = CT.BRG_CUSTOMERCOLLECTIONTYPE
GO

--

CREATE VIEW dbo.VW_Worker
AS
SELECT HCM.PERSONNELNUMBER 'Worker_ID'
	  ,DIR.NAME 'Worker_Name'
	  ,isnull(DU.USER_,'NoUser') 'Username'
	  ,RE.Job
	  ,RE.Department
	  ,RE.Branch
FROM [Briggs_MST].[HCMWorker_ext] HCM
left join [Briggs_MST].[DIRPartyTable_ext] DIR on DIR.RECID = HCM.PERSON
left join [BriggsAX].[RosterEmployee_ext] RE on RE.Employee_ID = HCM.PERSONNELNUMBER and RE.File_Date = (select max(file_date) from [BriggsAX].[RosterEmployee_ext])
left join [Briggs_MST].[DirPersonUser_ext] DU on DU.PERSONPARTY = DIR.recid
GO

--

CREATE VIEW dbo.VW_WorkCenter
AS
SELECT WC.WRKCTRID 'Work_Center_ID'
	  ,WC.NAME 'Work_Center_Name'
	  ,CASE
			WHEN WC.WRKCTRTYPE = 2 THEN 'Vendor'
			when WC.WRKCTRTYPE = 5 then 'Group'
			when WC.WRKCTRTYPE = 1 and HCM.PERSONNELNUMBER is not null then 'Individual Employee'
			when WC.WRKCTRTYPE = 1 then 'Individual Non-Employee'
			else 'Unknown'
	   END 'Work_Center_Type'
	  ,CASE
			WHEN WC.WRKCTRTYPE = 5 THEN 'NA'
			when WG.WRKCTRID IS NULL then 'Unknown'
			else WG.WRKCTRID
	   END 'Work_Center_Group'
	  ,CASE 
			WHEN WC.WRKCTRTYPE IN(2,5) THEN 'No'
			when WC.WRKCTRTYPE = 1 and HCM.PERSONNELNUMBER is not null then 'Yes'
			WHEN WC.WRKCTRTYPE = 1 and HCM.PERSONNELNUMBER IS NULL THEN 'No'
			else 'Unknown'
	   END 'is_Worker'
	  ,CASE 
			WHEN WC.WRKCTRTYPE IN(2,5) THEN 'NA'
			when WC.WRKCTRTYPE = 1 and HCM.PERSONNELNUMBER is not null then HCM.PERSONNELNUMBER
			WHEN WC.WRKCTRTYPE = 1 and HCM.PERSONNELNUMBER IS NULL THEN 'NA'
			else 'Unknown'
	   END 'Worker_ID'
	  ,CASE 
			WHEN WC.WRKCTRTYPE IN(2,5) THEN 'NA'
			when WC.WRKCTRTYPE = 1 and HCM.PERSONNELNUMBER is not null then DIR.NAME
			WHEN WC.WRKCTRTYPE = 1 and HCM.PERSONNELNUMBER IS NULL THEN 'NA'
			else 'Unknown'
	   END 'Worker_Name'
	  ,CASE 
			WHEN WC.WRKCTRTYPE IN(2,5) THEN 'NA'
			when WC.WRKCTRTYPE = 1 and HCM.PERSONNELNUMBER is not null then isnull(replace(la.languagecodeid,'TEAM','Team'),'Unknown')
			WHEN WC.WRKCTRTYPE = 1 and HCM.PERSONNELNUMBER IS NULL THEN 'NA'
			else 'Unknown'
	   END 'Worker_Team'
FROM [Briggs_MST].[WrkCtrTable_ext] WC
LEFT JOIN [Briggs_MST].[HCMWorker_ext] HCM ON HCM.PERSONNELNUMBER = WC.WRKCTRID
left join [Briggs_MST].[WrkCtrTableIndividualView_ext] WCI on WCI.WRKCTRID = WC.WRKCTRID and WCI.VALIDTO >= getdate()
left join [Briggs_MST].[WrkCtrResourceGroup_ext] WG on WG.recid = WCI.RESOURCEGROUP
left join [Briggs_MST].[DIRPartyTable_ext] dir on DIR.RECID = HCM.PERSON
LEFT JOIN [Briggs_MST].[HCMPersonPrivateDetails_ext] HPD on HPD.person = HCM.PERSON
left join [Briggs_MST].[HCMLanguageCode_ext] LA on LA.recid = HPD.NATIVELANGUAGE
GO

--

CREATE VIEW dbo.VW_GL_Account
AS
SELECT M.MAINACCOUNTID 'Ledger_Account_ID'
	  ,M.NAME 'Ledger_Account'
	  ,MC.DESCRIPTION 'Description'
	  ,MC.ACCOUNTCATEGORY 'Account_Category'
	  ,MC.ACCOUNTTYPE 'Account_Type'
FROM [Briggs_MST].[MainAccount_ext] M
left join [Briggs_MST].[MainAccountCategory_ext] MC on MC.ACCOUNTCATEGORYREF = M.ACCOUNTCATEGORYREF
GO

--

CREATE VIEW dbo.VW_Employee
AS
SELECT E.Employee_ID 'Employee_ID'
	  ,E.[Employee_Name] 'Employee_Name_LFM'
	  ,CASE
			WHEN E.[Status] like 'Term%' THEN 'Terminated'
			WHEN E.[Status] like 'Inact%' THEN 'Inactive'
			ELSE E.[Status]
	   END 'Employment_Status'
	  ,JJ.CategoryDescription 'Job_Category'
	  ,E.[Job] 'Job'
	  ,E.Last_Hire_Date 'Employee_Last_Hire_Date'
	  ,datediff(dd,E.Last_Hire_Date,cast(E.file_date as date)) 'Employee_Days_Employed'
	  ,eomonth(E.[File_Date]) 'Roster_End_Month'
FROM [BriggsAX].[RosterEmployee_ext] E
left join [BriggsAX].[RosterEmployee_ext] M on M.Employee_ID = E.Employee_ID and M.File_Date = E.File_Date
left join [BriggsHR].[EmployeeHeader_ext] EMPHIST on ltrim(rtrim(EMPHIST.IdentificationNumber)) = E.Employee_ID
left join [BriggsHR].[GLCodesDepartments_ext] G on cast(G.GLCode as varchar) = cast(E.Position_Ledger_Code as varchar) and cast(G.DepartmentCode as varchar) = cast(E.Department as varchar)
left join [BriggsHR].[JobCategory_ext] JJ on JJ.CategoryCode = G.CategoryCode
left join [BriggsHR].[GLCodesDepartments_ext] GM on cast(GM.GLCode as varchar) = cast(M.Position_Ledger_Code as varchar) and cast(GM.DepartmentCode as varchar) = cast(M.Department as varchar)
left join [BriggsHR].[JobCategory_ext] JJM on JJM.CategoryCode = GM.CategoryCode
GO

--

CREATE VIEW dbo.Supervisor
AS
SELECT M.[Employee_ID] 'Supervisor_Employee_ID'
	  ,M.[Employee_Name] 'Supervisor_Name_LFM'
	  ,JJM.CategoryDescription 'Supervisor_Job_Category'
	  ,M.[Job] 'Supervisor_Job'
	  ,M.Last_Hire_Date 'Supervisor_Last_Hire_Date'
	  ,datediff(dd,M.Last_Hire_Date,cast(E.file_date as date)) 'Supervisor_Days_Employed'
FROM [BriggsAX].[RosterEmployee_ext] E
left join [BriggsAX].[RosterEmployee_ext] M on M.Employee_ID = E.Employee_ID and M.File_Date = E.File_Date
left join [BriggsHR].[EmployeeHeader_ext] EMPHIST on ltrim(rtrim(EMPHIST.IdentificationNumber)) = E.Employee_ID
left join [BriggsHR].[GLCodesDepartments_ext] G on cast(G.GLCode as varchar) = cast(E.Position_Ledger_Code as varchar) and cast(G.DepartmentCode as varchar) = cast(E.Department as varchar)
left join [BriggsHR].[JobCategory_ext] JJ on JJ.CategoryCode = G.CategoryCode
left join [BriggsHR].[GLCodesDepartments_ext] GM on cast(GM.GLCode as varchar) = cast(M.Position_Ledger_Code as varchar) and cast(GM.DepartmentCode as varchar) = cast(M.Department as varchar)
left join [BriggsHR].[JobCategory_ext] JJM on JJM.CategoryCode = GM.CategoryCode
GO

--

CREATE VIEW dbo.TerrirtorySalesperson 
AS
select cs.territory 'Territory_Salesperson_ID'
,DP.BranchID 'Territory_Salesperson_Branch'
,isnull(DP.BranchID,'Unknown') 'Territory_Salesperson_Default_Branch'
,cs.division 'Territory_Salesperson_Division'
,cs.[type] 'Territory_Salesperson_Plan'
from [BriggsAX].[CommissionsSalesPeople_ext] CS
left join [Briggs_MST].[DIRPartyTable_ext] DP on DP.BranchID = CS.Branch
GO

--

CREATE VIEW dbo.AssignedSalesperson
AS
select isnull(CS.NAME,'Unassigned') 'Assigned_Salesperson'
	  ,case 
			when CS.workerid like 'SLS%' then 'NA'
			else isnull(ISNULL(DP.Name,'Unknown'),'Unknown')
	   end 'Assigned_Salesperson_Roster_Branch'
	  ,isnull(isnull(DP.Name,'Unknown'),'Unassigned') 'Assigned_Salesperson_Terr_Default_Branch'
	  ,isnull(DP.Name,'Unassigned') 'Assigned_Salesperson_Terr_Branch'
	  ,case
			when CS.workerid like 'SLS%' then 'NA'
			else isnull(g.DepartmentCodeDescription,'Unknown')
	   end 'Assigned_Salesperson_Empl_Status'
from [BriggsAX].[CommissionsSalesPeople_ext] CS
left join [Briggs_MST].[DIRPartyTable_ext] DP on DP.BranchID = CS.Branch
left join [BriggsAX].[RosterEmployee_ext] RE on DP.BranchID = RE.Branch
left join [BriggsHR].[EmployeeHeader_ext] emphist on ltrim(rtrim(emphist.IdentificationNumber)) = cs.WorkerId
left join [BriggsHR].[GLCodesDepartments_ext] G on cast(g.GLCode as varchar) = cast(isnull(RE.Position_Ledger_Code,emphist.GLCode) as varchar) 
												and cast(g.DepartmentCode as varchar) = cast(isnull(RE.Department,emphist.DepartmentCode) as varchar)
GO

--

CREATE VIEW dbo.CallTypes
AS
SELECT tt.CALLTYPEID 'Call_Type_ID'
,tl.CALLSTATUSID 'Call_Status_ID'
,tl.LINENUM 'Line_Num'
from [Briggs_MST].[XAP_SVCCallTypeLine_ext] tl
left join [Briggs_MST].[XAP_SVCCallTable_ext] tt on tt.recid = tl.CALLTYPEID
GO

--

CREATE VIEW dbo.Branch
AS
with p_addr_newest
AS(
SELECT 
ddv.DISPLAYVALUE
,MAX(LA.RECID) 'MAX_LOC'
FROM [Briggs_MST].[InventLocationLogisticsLocationPrimary_ext] ILV
LEFT JOIN [Briggs_MST].[LogisticsPostalAddressView_ext] LPA ON ILV.LOCATION = LPA.LOCATION
INNER JOIN [Briggs_MST].[LogisticsLocation_ext] LA ON LA.RECID = LPA.LOCATION
LEFT JOIN [Briggs_MST].[InventLocation_ext] i ON i.recid = ilv.INVENTLOCATION
LEFT JOIN [Briggs_MST].[DefaultDimensionView_ext] ddv ON ddv.DEFAULTDIMENSION = i.DEFAULTDIMENSION AND ddv.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEID = 5637145333

WHERE LPA.VALIDTO >= GETDATE()
AND i.INVENTSITEID = 'PARTS'
AND i.INVENTLOCATIONID LIKE 'P%'
AND i.NAME NOT LIKE '%DO NOT USE%'
GROUP BY
ddv.DISPLAYVALUE
) 

,p_addr
AS(
SELECT DISTINCT
 ddv.DISPLAYVALUE 'Branch_ID'
,RIGHT(ddv.Displayvalue,2) 'Branch_ID_Short'
,lpa.STREET
,lpa.ZIPCODE
,lpa.CITY
,lpa.STATE
,lv.ISOCODE
,lpa.COUNTRYREGIONID
,lv.COUNTRYCURRENCYCODE
,lpa.ADDRESS
,il.INVENTLOCATIONID
,lpa.TIMEZONE 'Time_Zone_ID'
FROM [Briggs_MST].[InventLocation_ext] il
INNER JOIN [Briggs_MST].[InventLocationLogisticsLocationPrimary_ext] a ON il.recid = a.INVENTLOCATION
LEFT JOIN [Briggs_MST].[LogisticsPostalAddressView_ext] lv ON lv.LOCATION = a.LOCATION AND lv.VALIDTO >= GETDATE()
LEFT JOIN [Briggs_MST].[DefaultDimensionView_ext] ddv ON ddv.DEFAULTDIMENSION = il.DEFAULTDIMENSION AND ddv.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEID = 5637145333
LEFT JOIN [Briggs_MST].[LogisticsPostalAddress_ext] lpa ON lpa.LOCATION = lv.LOCATION AND LPA.VALIDTO >= GETDATE()
INNER JOIN [Briggs_MST].[LogisticsLocation_ext] LA ON LA.RECID = LPA.LOCATION
INNER JOIN p_addr_newest pn ON pn.DISPLAYVALUE = ddv.DISPLAYVALUE AND pn.MAX_LOC = la.RECID
WHERE il.INVENTSITEID = 'PARTS'
AND il.INVENTLOCATIONID LIKE 'P%'
) 

select dir.[OMOPERATINGUNITNUMBER] 'Branch_ID'
,dir.[NAME] 'Branch'
,ISNULL(ISNULL(p_addr.ADDRESS,pc.ADDRESS),'Unknown') 'Address'
,ISNULL(ISNULL(p_addr.STREET,pc.STREET),'Unknown') 'Street'
,ISNULL(ISNULL(p_addr.CITY,pc.CITY),'Unknown') 'City'
,ISNULL(ISNULL(p_addr.STATE,pc.STATE),'Unknown') 'State'
,ISNULL(CAST(ISNULL(p_addr.ZIPCODE,pc.ZIPCODE) AS VARCHAR(20)),'Unknown') 'Zip_Code'

FROM [Briggs_MST].[DIRPartyTable_ext] dir 
LEFT JOIN [Briggs_MST].[DIRPartyMemo_ext] m ON m.PARTY = dir.RECID
LEFT JOIN [Briggs_MST].[HCMWorker_ext] hcm ON hcm.recid = dir.HCMWORKER
LEFT JOIN [Briggs_MST].[DIRPartyTable_ext] dir_ldr ON dir_ldr.recid = hcm.PERSON
LEFT JOIN p_addr ON p_addr.Branch_ID = dir.[OMOPERATINGUNITNUMBER]
LEFT JOIN p_addr pc ON pc.Branch_ID_Short = RIGHT(dir.[OMOPERATINGUNITNUMBER],2)
LEFT JOIN [Briggs_MST].[TimeZonesList_ext] tz ON tz.TZENUM = ISNULL(p_addr.Time_Zone_ID,pc.Time_Zone_ID)

order by dir.[OMOPERATINGUNITNUMBER]
GO

--

CREATE VIEW dbo.Region
AS
with wh
as(
select 
dp.[OMOPERATINGUNITNUMBER] as [VALUE]
,il.INVENTLOCATIONID
from [Briggs_MST].[InventLocation_ext] il
inner join [Briggs_MST].[DefaultDimensionView_ext] ddv on ddv.DEFAULTDIMENSION = il.DEFAULTDIMENSION and ddv.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEID = 5637145333
inner join [Briggs_MST].[DIRPartyTable_ext] DP on DP.[OMOPERATINGUNITNUMBER] = ddv.DISPLAYVALUE

),tech_status
as(

select 
branch
,count(*) 'Employees'

from [BriggsAX].[RosterEmployee_ext] e
where e.file_date = (select max(file_date) from [BriggsAX].[RosterEmployee_ext])
and e.Status = 'Active'
and e.Position_Ledger_Code = '600010'
group by branch

)
select m.MEMO 'Region'
	  ,case 
			when dir_ldr.[NAME] is null or dir_ldr.[NAME] = '' then 'Inactive Branch' 
			else dir_ldr.[NAME]
	   end 'Region_Leader'
	  ,case 
			when isnull(es.employees,0) = 0 then 'Inactive'
			else 'Active'
	   end 'Branch_Tech_Empl_Status'
from [Briggs_MST].[DIRPartyTable_ext] br
left join wh on wh.[VALUE] = br.[OMOPERATINGUNITNUMBER]
left join [Briggs_MST].[InventLocation_ext] a on wh.[INVENTLOCATIONID] = a.INVENTLOCATIONID
left join [Briggs_MST].[OMOperatingUnitView_ext] om on OM.RECID = br.[RECID]
left join [Briggs_MST].[DIRPartyTable_ext] dir on dir.PARTYNUMBER = om.PARTYNUMBER
left join [Briggs_MST].[DIRPartyMemo_ext] m on m.PARTY = dir.RECID
left join tech_status es on es.Branch = br.[OMOPERATINGUNITNUMBER]
left join [Briggs_MST].[HCMWorker_ext] hcm on hcm.recid = dir.HCMWORKER
left join [Briggs_MST].[DIRPartyTable_ext] dir_ldr on dir_ldr.recid = hcm.PERSON
where ((a.INVENTLOCATIONID like 'P%') or (a.INVENTLOCATIONID like 'E%'))
GO
